forum.content:
Hey there,
If you have any questions about studying in U.S. or applying for universities, please feel welcome to text me. Remember to send me a request saying that you want to know more information about studying abroad so I can add you.

Here is something about myself. I learn English since I was 5, and I am currently a Sophomore in University of San Francisco. I am on my vacation right now in Taiwan, but leaving on 27th of June.

大家好,
如果想知道關於美國留學資訊或申請學校相關問題的, 可以問我. 如果想加好友問問題, 那請記得標記說你想問一些關於留學資訊方便加好友.

我從五歲就開始學英文. 現在在美國舊金山大學唸大二. 我正在放暑假, 但是6/27 就要回去了.
forum.title: 美國留學資訊
